channel.title: How to make perfect dead like on old rs. ++rep for help!
channel.description:
If any 1 knows how to make perfect dead like on rs before graphic update. Pls tell me.
The reason is: when some1 kills some1 on my serv the guy just disapears with no death emote, so if any 1 knows how to make death emote work? like u die do death emote and than tele? Pls help me!
